verses.verse: Then I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> that was over <S%H5921><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> something like a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> in appearance <S%H4758><s%> resembling <S%H1823><s%> a throne, <S%H3678><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> them.

And He spoke <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Enter <S%H935><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the whirling <S%H1534><s%> wheels <S%H1534><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> your hands <S%H2651><s%> with coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> and scatter <S%H2236><s%> [them] over <S%H5921><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>" And he entered <S%H935><s%> in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Now the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> were standing <S%H5975><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> side <S%H3225><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%> when the man <S%H376><s%> entered, <S%H935><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court. <S%H2691><s%>

Then the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H7311><s%> up from the cherub <S%H3742><s%> to the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the temple, <S%H1004><s%> and the temple <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and the court <S%H2691><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Moreover, the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the outer <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> when He speaks. <S%H1696><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when He commanded <S%H6680><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the whirling <S%H1534><s%> wheels, <S%H1534><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%>" he entered <S%H935><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> a wheel. <S%H212><s%>

Then the cherub <S%H3742><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] between <S%H996><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> some and put <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H2651><s%> of the one clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who took <S%H3947><s%> [it] and went <S%H3318><s%> out.
And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to have the form <S%H8403><s%> of a man's hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

Then I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> each <S%H259><s%> cherub; <S%H3742><s%> and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> [was] like the gleam <S%H5869><s%> of a Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> stone. <S%H68><s%>

And as for their appearance, <S%H4758><s%> all four <S%H702><s%> of them had the same <S%H259><s%> likeness, <S%H1823><s%> as if <S%H834><s%> one wheel <S%H212><s%> were within <S%H8432><s%> another wheel. <S%H212><s%>

When they moved, <S%H1980><s%> they went <S%H1980><s%> in [any of] their four <S%H702><s%> directions <S%H7253><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> turning <S%H5437><s%> as they went; <S%H1980><s%> but they followed <S%H310><s%> <S%H1980><s%> in the direction <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they faced, <S%H6437><s%> <S%H7218><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> turning <S%H5437><s%> as they went. <S%H1980><s%>

And their whole <S%H3605><s%> body, <S%H1320><s%> their backs, <S%H1354><s%> their hands, <S%H3027><s%> their wings, <S%H3671><s%> and the wheels <S%H212><s%> were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around, <S%H5439><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> belonging to all four <S%H702><s%> of them.
The wheels <S%H212><s%> were called <S%H7121><s%> in my hearing, <S%H241><s%> the whirling <S%H1534><s%> wheels. <S%H1534><s%>

And each <S%H259><s%> one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces. <S%H6440><s%> The first <S%H259><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> [was] the face <S%H6440><s%> of a cherub, <S%H3742><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> [was] the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion, <S%H9030><s%> and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle. <S%H5404><s%>
Then the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> rose <S%H7426><s%> up. They are the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar. <S%H3529><s%>

Now when the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> moved, <S%H1980><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> would go <S%H1980><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> them; also when the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their wings <S%H3671><s%> to rise <S%H7311><s%> from the ground, <S%H776><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> would not turn <S%H5437><s%> from beside <S%H681><s%> them.

When the cherubim stood <S%H5975><s%> still, <S%H5975><s%> the wheels would stand <S%H5975><s%> still; <S%H5975><s%> and when they rose <S%H7426><s%> up, the wheels would rise <S%H7311><s%> with them; for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> [was] in them.

Then the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

When the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> departed, <S%H3318><s%> they lifted <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> and rose <S%H7426><s%> up from the earth <S%H776><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%> with the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them; and they stood <S%H5975><s%> still <S%H5975><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord's house. <S%H1004><s%> And the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hovered <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them.

These <S%H1931><s%> are the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> beneath <S%H8478><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar; <S%H3529><s%> so I knew <S%H3045><s%> that they [were] cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

Each <S%H259><s%> one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> and each <S%H259><s%> one <S%H259><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wings, <S%H3671><s%> and beneath <S%H8478><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> [was] the form <S%H1823><s%> of human <S%H120><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>

As for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces, <S%H6440><s%> they were the same <S%H1992><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> appearance <S%H4758><s%> I had seen <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar. <S%H3529><s%> Each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> straight <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> ahead. <S%H6440><s%>
